message.name: ERR_MISSING_MANDATORY_ATTRIBUTE
message.locale: The %1s is mandatory.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_RECORD_NOT_IN_DATASTORE
message.locale: Evidence record not in dynamic evidence datastore. Record ID: %1s

message.name: ERR_UNKNOWN_RELATIONSHIP
message.locale: Unknown parent evidence %1s

message.name: ERR_MISSING_MANDATORY_PARENT
message.locale: Parent evidence %1s must be specified.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_OPTIONAL_PARENT
message.locale: A parent evidence must be specified. This can be one of %1s.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_OPTIONAL_PARENTS
message.locale: Only one parent evidence must be specified. This can be one of %1s.

message.name: ERR_DUPLICATE_RELATIONSHIP
message.locale: Duplicate parent %1s evidence.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_RELATIONSHIP
message.locale: Parent evidence %1s does not exist.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_RELATED_CASEPARTICIPANT_ROLE
message.locale: %1s must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CHILD_EXISTS_FOR_PARENT_TO_DISCARD
message.locale: This %1s record cannot be discarded as there is a related %2s record. To discard the %3s record, you must first discard/remove the related %4s record.

message.name: ERR_DATE_YEAR_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The %1s must be on or before '12/31/9999'.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATE_IS_GREATERTHAN
message.locale: The %1s must be after the Current Date.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATE_IS_LESSTHAN
message.locale: The %1s must be before the Current Date.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATE_IS_LESSTHAN_EQUALTO
message.locale: The value entered in the '%1s' field must be on or before the Current Date.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATE_IS_GREATERTHAN_EQUALTO
message.locale: The %1s must be on or after the Current Date.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATE_IS_EQUALTO
message.locale: The %1s must be a Current Date.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATE_IS_NOT_EQUALTO
message.locale: The %1s must not be a Current Date.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATETIME_IS_GREATERTHAN
message.locale: The %1s must be after the Current DateTime.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATETIME_IS_LESSTHAN
message.locale: The %1s must be before the Current DateTime.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATETIME_IS_LESSTHAN_EQUALTO
message.locale: The %1s must be on or before the Current DateTime.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATETIME_IS_GREATERTHAN_EQUALTO
message.locale: The %1s must be on or after the Current DateTime.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATETIME_IS_EQUALTO
message.locale: The %1s must be a Current DateTime.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_DATETIME_IS_NOT_EQUALTO
message.locale: The %1s must not be a Current DateTime.

message.name: ERR_NONVOLATILE_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
message.locale: %1s cannot be modified across successive records of this evidence object.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_EFFECTIVE_DATE_BEFORE_BUSINESS_START_DATE
message.locale: The effective date cannot be before the evidence start date.
